channel.title: who is best for notepages?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "who is best for notepages?"

item.title: Re: who is best for notepages?
item.content:encoded:
She doesn't so much drop them as shed them. And since it's really hot in wastelands, she sheds quite a bit.

Anyway, if you're going to use Right's autoget ally drops jutsu, then you want to use Hyuk (so you can get juicy apples as well), Some other person who drops pages, and Olmek. If you're first season, then replace Olmek with yet another persons who drops note pages.

This also works well with Goodboy's I need This jutsu.

item.title: Re: who is best for notepages?
item.content:encoded: I didn't even know the paper dropped note pages LOL. But Right and Hyuk seem to drop pages at the same rate, and it's about 6 apples per 1 page from Hyuk. I don't know about Lisalisa.

item.title: Re: who is best for notepages?
item.content:encoded: Best ally for Note Pages is The Paper, one of the advanced Wasteland Allies.

item.title: Re: who is best for notepages?
item.content:encoded:
I would say go for hyuk cuz he drops both apples and notepages which is always good. You could do anon if you didn't really care for the apples cuz you get apples more frequently than notepages w/ hyuk.

BTW could you notepage bingo me?
I'm Yoshi Naku of Relentless Village.

item.title: who is best for notepages?
item.content:encoded:
which allies drop note pages most frequently?

does hyuk drop more than anonymous?

i'm pretty sure lisalisa drops the most but who drops most after her?

i need to know so i know who to put in my team for farming for notepages, anon or hyuk (i don't have right yet).
the other two spots are already taken by the HoClaus and olmek lol.

thanks to all who answer.
